meanings.sent1: The dinosaur had a boney skeleton.

meanings.sent3: The boney chair creaked under his weight.
meanings.sent4: Her boney fingers tapped nervously on the table.
meanings.sent5: The boney cliffs jutted out into the sea.

meanings.sent1: The boney face of the old man showed wisdom.

meanings.sent1: After being sick, she looked boney and frail.
meanings.sent2: The stray dog was boney from lack of food.

meanings.sent4: His boney frame made him appear fragile.
meanings.sent5: The boney figure in the mirror startled her.
